scripts.copy:flatpickr: powershell -NoProfile -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force static/vendor/flatpickr/l10n | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Force node_modules/flatpickr/dist/flatpickr.min.css static/vendor/flatpickr/; Copy-Item -Force node_modules/flatpickr/dist/flatpickr.min.js static/vendor/flatpickr/; Copy-Item -Force node_modules/flatpickr/dist/l10n/pt.js static/vendor/flatpickr/l10n/"
scripts.format: npm run format:html && npm run format:css && npm run format:js
